 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  Craft Director Studio v10.1                                             ³
 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  With support for the new versions of Autodesk's 3ds Max 2011, Maya      ³
 ³  2011 and Softimage 2011.                                                ³
 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  Founded in 2006 and based in Gothenburg, Sweden, Craft Animations       ³
 ³  is a developer of real-time 3D animations tools, called Craft           ³
 ³  Director Studio, which streamline production times by nearly 90         ³
 ³  procent, saving the user both time and money.                           ³
 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  Based on cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence and           ³
 ³  autonomous control systems, Craft Director Studio extends creative      ³
 ³  possibilities by eliminating the time-consuming tasks of                ³
 ³  keyframing, scripting and rigging. Users gain the experience of a       ³
 ³  new era of animation with an opportunity to create natural motion       ³
 ³  paths on-the-fly, optionally with the use of an input device,           ³
 ³  gaining instant gratification through highly realistic interactive      ³
 ³  real-time animation.                                                    ³
 ³  Key Benefits                                                            ³
 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  Visual for film and Broadcast - Craft Director Studio provide           ³
 ³  realistic and accurate vehicle incident and traffic animation,          ³
 ³  collision visualizations and scene fly-throughs in less time than       ³
 ³  it takes them to write teleprompter text, allowing more                 ³
 ³  time for creativity.                                                    ³
 ³                                                                          ³
 ³  Previsualization - Craft Director Studio are interactive, providing     ³
 ³  better real-time control for precise movements exactly as               ³
 ³  envisioned by a producer or director.                                   ³
